review_data.title: Huge and varied complex

review_data.title: A great outdoor place in the midst of Zurich: very social, good food and a nice setting
review_data.content: The Gessnerallee is what comes closest in Zurich to the various beer gardens in Munich. Sitting under the trees on a warm summernight and enjoying quality food for reasonable prices does not come often in Zurich. The offer is sometimes adventurous, but most of the...More
